text: Michael Garrett Shanks (born December 15, 1970, Vancouver, British Columbia) is a Canadian actor, writer and director. He became famous for his role as Dr. Daniel Jackson on the television series Stargate SG-1. He also provided the voice of the character Thor for this show. He is a film and television actor. ==Other websites== * Michael Shanks Online - The Official Michael Shanks Website * * Michael Shanks TV Guide Blog Category:1970 births Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Living people Category:Actors from Vancouver
title: Michael Shanks
